Articles.Content:
Soon I plan to release a Space Station and would like your opinion. I have the early stages of the build and its very challenging to Orbit. Structure is weak, too much speed and catastrophic failure is a sure thing, staging is not complete, unnecessary amounts of fuel. With all this your Launch has to be a very mindful one of speed, gravity turn and staging...etc.

Should I release a Jebediah Junkyard Version?

Edited October 27, 2018 by Castille7
